dedicatedCloud_datacenter_backup_new_des: It seems you have not enabled a backup service
You can choose between 3 new solutions to back up your virtual machines (VMs): Standard, Advanced and Premium.
The solution chosen for this datacenter will be the only one available for the other datacenters in this Private Cloud, and the only one applicable to all of your virtual machines.
